original_title: KAKSS Supreme Quality Steel Dumbbell With Stand 12kg(1.5kg+2kg+2.5kg Pair)
optimized_title: WEIDER Steel Dumbbells Set with Rack, 12kg Weights Set (1.5kg, 2kg, 2.5kg Dumbbells Pairs), Silver and Black Gym Weights Dumbbell Set for women and men Home Workout, steel and plastic dumbell set

image_analysis.product_name: KAKSS Supreme Quality Steel Dumbbell With Stand 12kg (1.5kg+2kg+2.5kg Pair)
key_features: Steel dumbbells in three weight levels: 1.5, 2, and 2.5
Includes a compact black stand/rack for storage
Printed weight number on each dumbbell end
image_analysis.usage: Strength training and general fitness workouts at home or in small gyms, using different dumbbell weights stored on a compact rack.
image_analysis.target_audience: Home fitness users, beginners to intermediate lifters, and people wanting a compact dumbbell set with stand.
image_analysis.ai_description: A compact dumbbell set featuring three chrome-finished steel pairs marked 1.5, 2 and 2.5 on the ends, resting on a black, tree-shaped plastic rack. The rack has curved cradles on each side and a central cutout, neatly organizing all six dumbbells in a small footprint.

comparison_points.our_benefit: Steel dumbbells give solid, long‑lasting weight vs foam‑covered sets that wear out fast
comparison_points.competitor_issue: Cheap neoprene/foam dumbbells crack, peel and look worn after a few months

comparison_points.our_benefit: Includes 1.5, 2 and 2.5kg pairs so you can progress in small, manageable steps
comparison_points.competitor_issue: Many budget sets skip in big jumps, making weights either too light or too heavy

comparison_points.our_benefit: Printed weight on each dumbbell end lets you grab the right pair instantly
comparison_points.competitor_issue: Low‑cost sets use stickers or faint print that rubs off and causes confusion

comparison_points.our_benefit: Compact plastic rack keeps all six steel dumbbells tidy and off the floor
comparison_points.competitor_issue: Cheaper sets arrive loose with no stand, creating clutter and trip hazards
